text:
I STATED IN A LETTER TO WNTH , WHO, I BELIEVE, HAS WRITTEN TO YOU
ABOUT THIS PROPOSAL, THAT I FELT, HAVING MET YOU, THAT YOU WOULD
DO NOTHING TO HURT THE CHANCES OF THE TEN WATT OPERATIONS' CONTINUING
Thanks for all of the help you have been in the past, Jerry, and
KEEP DOING THE FINE JOB NER HAS IN THE PAST FEW YEARS. We, ON THIS
END, APPRECIATE IT.
Sincerely,
James F. Bailey
